>25%: Gift from the bank, you get 40.000
Your birthday, get 15.000 from each player
25%: Gilang the hacker hacks your bank account and loses 20.000
Fortune block card, when you pass the start, you only get 5.000
Your car is broken, pay 35.000 repair costs
You get 20.000 times the number on the selected coin
15%: Debt collectors come to your house, you pay 60.000 debt
Select the city you want to go to
8%: Monthly salary has been paid, you get 160.000

>25%: You find 50.000 on the road, take the money or take 2 steps forward
25%: Home renovation, pay 30% of the total money
You chased by a monitor lizard, take 2 steps back
Go forward to the start or take a general fund card
Gaming dice card, get 10.000 multiplied by the rolled dice number
15%: Gilang drops his ichi ocha, you have to take 3 steps back to return it
Try your luck, go to free parking or go to jail
8%: You are caught red-handed in corruption, go to jail & fined 90% of the total money
You get a surprise money of 200.000

reminder: Each card can only be used once
Cannot have 2 same card, if you get 2x anti tax card it'll only count as 1
page 1: Anti Jail = when you step on jail tile, you can avoid imprisoned effect
Anti Tax = avoid paying tax on stepping someone's city
Gaming Dice = get money 10k * dice number
Nerf Gaming Dice = get money 5k * dice number
page 2: Sad Gaming Dice = loss money 5k * dice number
Nerf Parking = your tile selection on stepping free parking is 40% less
Fortune Block = when passing start line, only get 5k
City Upgrade = can upgrade your city without getting there, but random
